tasks.task: Operate rainwater collection system for agricultural use.
subtasks: Assemble components of rainwater collection system.
Route water through T-fitting into shunt pipe.
Drill tiny hole in first flush diverter.
Filter particulate matter using nylon stocking.
Operate sump pump to transfer water to reservoir.
Install jet pump for pressure boost in greenhouse.
Manage indoor reservoir for early spring use.

tasks.task: Irrigate greenhouse seedlings with collected rainwater.
subtasks: Regulate water source switching between reservoir and collected rainwater.
Contribute to seedling health by using rainwater over saline well water.
Address pepper plant needs with abundant rainwater supply.
Demonstrate use of overhead irrigation system (flying festoon).
